FuncDef: This command sets the offset value for the IPv6 unicast address family. If the number of operational links drops below theoper-membersthreshold, the configured offset is applied to the interface metric for the IPv6 topology.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the amount the interface metric for the associated address family is to be increased if the number of operational members in the associated link-group drops below the oper-members threshold. Values-0 to 6777215.
